query.Avail Leave: Flexi leave not avail for ILP trainees
query.How to apply for leave: Need to get the approval from the tech and Biz Faculty. Once they approve, the Facilitation Team will check if the leave can be approved from HR. Upon the confirmation leave will be approved. Once the leave is approved the associate needs to apply for leave in Ultimatix and submit the leave request form.
query.What is Emergency Leave: Personal Emergency leave (when you fall sick) and family emergency.
